DOC.brief_summary: A 12-Month , Open-Label , Flexible-Dosage Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy GABITRIL Treatment Adults Generalized Anxiety Disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy GABITRIL Treatment Adults With Generalized Anxiety Disorder .
DOC.criteria: Subjects complete 10 week doubleblind treatment subsequent taper period 1 3 previous doubleblind study ( study C6671/3030/AX/US , C6671/3031/AX/US , C6671/3032/AX/US ) .
